name: Albert Einstein

greeks_four_temperament.name: Phlegmatic
greeks_four_temperament.desc: Calm, introspective, often lost in deep thought.

mbti.name: INTP
mbti.desc: Analytical thinker, values logic, curious about abstract theories.

jungian_archetype.name: Sage
jungian_archetype.desc: Seeker of knowledge, driven by understanding the mysteries of the universe.

appearance: White wild hair, moustache, casual attire; often deep in thought, expressive eyes.
motivation: Uncovering the principles governing the universe
Advocating for peace and humanitarian causes
motto: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
history: Born in 1879 in Ulm, Germany; displayed curiosity from a young age.
Published Special Relativity in 1905, altering the view of space and time.
Fled Nazi Germany in 1933, later contributed to U.S. wartime research.
